column2: Duke Energy to pay $146 mln to settle lawsuit over CEO removal March 10 Duke Energy Corp said it would pay $146 million to settle a shareholder lawsuit related to the ouster of its chief executive following its merger with Progress Energy in 2012.

column3: March 10 TD Ameritrade Holding Corp  has no interest at the moment in buying smaller discount brokerage rival E*Trade Financial Corp

column2: Germany's Voith launches sale of industrial services business -sourcesUPDATE 1-EQT Midstream to buy parent EQT Corp's gas-gathering assets for $1 bln March 10 EQT Midstream Partners LP said it would buy parent EQT Corp's Northern West Virginia Marcellus Gathering System and a preferred interest in an EQT subsidiary for about $1.05 billion.  UPDATE 1-EQT Midstream to buy parent EQT Corp's gas-gathering assets for $1 bln March 10 EQT Midstream Partners LP said it would buy parent EQT Corp's Northern West Virginia Marcellus Gathering System and a preferred interest in an EQT subsidiary for about $1.05 billion.
